ygData.subject: Hmmmm.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hm. Cronik wonder where de all go.  Me know. This test of Thule!  Me not let silence drive
ygData.messageBody:
<stands before an abyss, all around is desolation>
Hm. Cronik wonder where de all go. <scratches head> Me
know. This test of Thule! Me not let silence drive me
jump in abyss. Me CAN handle silence.
<Draws out big axe and starts to sharpen it> Cronik wait
for squishy headed elfies to come play. <swings axe to
test the balance> Then air be fill wit screams that are
song to Thule! Thule reward devoted! Heh. Cronik make
world look like visions gived by THule!
<Lets loose a Might Bellow>
YOU are bashed by waves of force for 300 points of
damage!

Wake up sleepy heads. :) I know there are more than 6
people on this list! What are your characters up to? I
want to hear it. It is boring here at work right now.
PLZ!

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
11th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
